item.title: Roblox: Arcade Basketball Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Even though Arcade Basketball has a simple gameplay, your victory depends directly on your skills. Whether it is defense or attack, you need to use the right skills to run and earn Coins. For this reason, new players are quite slow to farm money. And to fix this, you should use Arcade Basketball codes.

As expected from Roblox codes, they contain various rewards from the developers. Most of them grant players different amounts of Coins. However, their validity is limited, so it is recommended that you redeem them as soon as possible.

Updated September 14, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Arcade Basketball offers several opportunities to claim free rewards that can help you progress faster. You can get items like coins, spins, crates, and XP, with some rewards requiring you to follow creators or join a group. These extras make it easier to unlock upgrades and enjoy the game without spending as much time grinding. Be sure to check back later, as more options may become available in the future.

All Arcade Basketball Codes

Working Arcade Basketball Codes

  • LAUNCH - Redeem this code to get Crate (NEW)
  • FREESPINS - Redeem this code to get Spins
  • 4700Likes! - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins
  • THANKS - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins
  • Release - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins
  • Group - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins (Requires joining a Roblox group)
  • SkeletorAngel - Redeem this code to get 500 XP (Requires following the @SkeletorAngel user)
  • SOLOSEBEE - Redeem this code to get 250 Coins (Requires following the @SOLOSEBEE user)
  • 4p0 - Redeem this code to get 250 Coins (Requires following the @4p0 user)

Expired Arcade Basketball Codes

  • 5KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins
  • 10KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 300 Coins

Arcade Basketball offers players an exciting basketball experience. Instead of playing in the usual big fields, you will have to play a maximum of 2v2 with one basket. But this does not mean that it will be easy for you to win. Depending on whether you play defense or offense, you have access to different moves. Using them at the right time, you can easily both score goals and protect the basket from opponents. And to diversify the matches, players can customize their characters by buying crates with items. And if you want to earn a lot of money from the beginning of the game, then Arcade Basketball is what you need.

Even a few of these codes will reward you with more than 500 Coins, which is enough to buy one crate. But it is worth noting that after some time, the codes expire. For this reason, you need to use them while they are still active.

How to Redeem Arcade Basketball Codes

At first glance, it may seem that Arcade Basketball has the same code redemption feature as most other Roblox experiences. However, in reality, most codes require certain conditions to be met, such as joining a group or following a user. But by following these steps, you can easily claim your rewards without any problems:

  • Launch Arcade Basketball .
  • Open the Menu by clicking on the corresponding button in the lower left corner of the screen.
  • Next, select the Codes option.
  • After that, you must make sure that you have fulfilled a certain code condition and enter it in the field.
  • Finally, click the Confirm button to claim free goodies.

How to Get More Arcade Basketball Codes

To avoid missing out on new Arcade Basketball codes, you should bookmark this guide, as we are going to update it over time, like our other Roblox codes articles. In addition, you can visit the official social media pages of the developers. There, players will find all the latest news about upcoming events, updates, and of course, codes:

  • Arcade Basketball Roblox group
  • Arcade Basketball Discord server
Roblox
443
8.8 /10
Released
September 1, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
T for Teen
Platform(s)
PC, iOS, Xbox One, PS4
Powered by

item.title: Clash Royale Creator Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Clash Royale is one of the most popular mobile games in the world, and thousands of players play it every day, each trying to become the best. Many gamers often check resources, such as YouTubers or streamers, to understand their strategy or even copy their deck to be as good in battles. Once you have gained experience and a working strategy after watching the video, you can support your favorite player by redeeming Clash Royale creator codes. This way, after each purchase, the chosen creator will receive a piece of the profits, so it's a great way to thank those who helped you.

Updated September 14, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Clash Royale has a wide selection of creator codes that let you support your favorite content creators while you play. By using these codes, a portion of your in-game purchases helps the creators continue making guides, videos, and other community content. It’s a simple way to give back to those who share strategies and entertainment. Keep an eye out for updates, as more creators may be added over time.

Clash Royale: All Creator Codes

The number of creators is growing every day, as is their fanbase. At the moment, there are already many creators in the game whose code you can redeem to support them. Below are all the current creators codes, so you can choose the one you deem your favorite.

Clash Royale: How to Redeem Creator Codes

Redeeming Creator Codes in Clash Royale is not difficult and will take you a few clicks. If you haven't done it before, here are the detailed instructions:

  • Go to the in-game store.
  • Scroll down until you see the Creator Boost section.
  • There will be a green Enter Code button in the Creator Boost section. Click on it.
  • After doing so, you will open a new menu with an input field and an OK button.
  • Now enter one of the above Creator Codes in the input field.
  • Click the OK button to confirm your choice.

It is worth noting that by redeeming the code, you will not support one creator forever. You can change to another at any time.

Clash Royale

item.title: Roblox: Golf Range Tycoon Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Golf Range Tycoon Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Golf Range Tycoon
  • How to Get More Golf Range Tycoon Codes

Golf Range Tycoon is a great business simulator where you will have to develop your own golf empire. Here you will have to build the entire golf course from scratch, and then serve customers to earn money for new improvements and expansions.

As in other Roblox games, in Golf Range Tycoon you can redeem codes that will bring you a lot of freebies and valuable rewards that will be especially useful from the very beginning. Redeeming codes won't take you much time or effort, and you'll get a decent amount of Cash in return, which will serve as a great start-up capital.

Updated September 14, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Golf Range Tycoon currently has a single reward you can claim. It gives you a quick boost of in-game cash, which can help you expand and improve your range faster. Even though only one option is available right now, it’s worth grabbing so you don’t miss out on the free resources. Be sure to check back often in case new rewards are added later.

All Golf Range Tycoon Codes

Working Golf Range Tycoon Codes

  • HOLEINONE - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.

Expired Golf Range Tycoon Codes

There are currently no expired Golf Range Tycoon codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Golf Range Tycoon codes is probably the only good way to earn Cash quickly from the very beginning of the game. So, if you have just started playing and don't want to spend too much time on probably the most difficult part - the beginning of the game with zero capital, redeeming codes is exactly what you need.

How to Redeem Codes for Golf Range Tycoon

Redeeming Golf Range Tycoon codes will take you a few clicks because the developers have made this option easy and accessible. If you have never redeemed a Roblox code before and don't know or understand how it works, please use our guide:

  • Launch Golf Range Tycoon .
  • Pay attention to the lower right corner of the screen. There will be a button labeled Redeem Code. Click on it.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Claim button next to it. Now, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Claim button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the right side of the screen with a list of rewards you have received.

How to Get More Golf Range Tycoon Codes

All codes for this Roblox game are first published on the game's official social media pages. Here, developers usually share them along with important announcements or to reward community activity. To save you time, here are all the links:

  • Official Golf Range Tycoon Roblox group.
  • Official Golf Range Tycoon Discord server.
  • Official Golf Range Tycoon X account.
  • Official Golf Range Tycoon YouTube channel.
Roblox
443
8.8 /10

September 1, 2006

item.title: Roblox: Type Soul Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Type Soul Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Type Soul
  • How to Play Type Soul
  • The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Type Soul
  • About the Type Soul Developers

Type Soul is a Roblox game set in the world of Bleach , where players must embark upon an incredible journey. The game offers a challenging experience where fans choose their path as Quincy, Hollow, or the popular choice, a Soul Reaper. By completing quests, missions, and PvP battles, players unlock powerful abilities such as Shikai and explore the various divisions of Soul Society.

The game combines strategy, character progression, and intense gameplay to deliver an engaging experience. Below, Roblox players will find all of the latest codes for Type Soul that offer different in-game rewards. So let's stop talking and dive right into the codes.

Updated September 14, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Type Soul has rolled out several new rewards that you can unlock right now. The latest set includes multiple fresh options tied to community events, content creator milestones, and special occasions. These join a long list of existing rewards that continue to support both new and returning players. Since more are frequently introduced, you’ll want to keep an eye out for the latest drops.

  • 20klikes - Redeem this code to claim Locked Weapon Reroll.
  • 10klikes - Redeem this code to claim Blue Pill.
  • sorryforshutdown - Redeem this code to claim Soul Ticket.

How to Redeem Codes for Type Soul

If players want to redeem the aforementioned codes, the process is quite straightforward. Just like in most other Roblox games, everything is done very simply and just requires a few buttons. But if fans still need help with the redemption, they can refer to the step-by-step instructions below:

  • First, it is necessary to launch Type Soul .
  • After that, press Play.
  • If the user is playing for the first time, then they will need to choose a gender and come up with a name.
  • After the player appears in the game, they should find and click or tap on the red button in the form of a gift; it is located on the top left but is semi-transparent, so it can be difficult to see.
  • When the button is pressed, a menu will appear with the Enter Code Here field in which fans must enter the code.
  • To redeem the code, just press Enter.

Also, keep in mind that each code can be redeemed only once per account.

How to Play Type Soul

At first glance, Type Soul is a rather complicated anime game. However, if players want to take their first steps and don't know where to start, this is no longer a problem. As a Lost Soul, players can choose one of three races in the game: Hollow, Quincy, or Soul Reaper. Below they will find some simple steps to take at the beginning of the game to successfully integrate into it:

Becoming a Hollow

To become a Hollow, press Ctrl K. But if the players don't want to be Hollow, then don't use this button at all.

Becoming a Quincy

  • As a Lost Soul, look for the Wanda gate located at coordinates xx:10 and xx:40. It has a blue side on the right and a white side on the left.
  • The gate is open for 10 minutes at specific times.
  • Enter the gate and follow the path to find a statue NPC that asks if players worship the king.
  • Interact with this NPC to become a Quincy.

Becoming a Soul Reaper

Currently, there are two ways to become a Soul Reaper: purification and a Shinigami Quest.

  • Players can ask a Soul Reaper player to purify them.
  • Keep an eye out for the Shinigami Quest, which may offer an alternative path to becoming a Soul Reaper.

The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Type Soul

Players looking for a new gaming experience need to look any further. Below they will find the 5 best games similar to Type Soul . Every anime fan will be able to find something for themselves:

  • Anime Adventures
  • Anime Souls Simulator
  • Anime Power Tycoon
  • Project Mugetsu
  • Titan Warfare

About the Type Soul Developers

Type Soul was created by a good team of developers. Here are their nicknames:

  • K1LLUAA
  • vvithdraw
  • Khaotxc
  • 4Data
  • drakoooos
  • cartier361

So far, this is the only game they have made together. Their Roblox group has very few subscribers and information, although the game itself has already collected more than one hundred thousand likes and one hundred and fifty million visits.

Roblox - Game
13
8.4 /10
Released
September 1, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Roblox Corporation
Publisher(s)
Roblox Corporation
Platform(s)
PC, iOS, Android, Xbox One, PS4
Powered by

item.title: The Best Part Of Each Grand Theft Auto Game
item.description:
Summary

  • The GTA series innovated with open-world chaos before it was the industry standard.
  • GTA 2 introduced gang respect, adding tactical layers to missions.
  • GTA 3's 3D world immersion signaled the franchise's cultural significance.

The Grand Theft Auto series has defined many generations of gaming, breaking ground with each new entry while constantly pushing the boundaries of open-world design. From top-down chaos to sprawling cityscapes, each title brought something new to the table, innovating within its own time and leaving a lasting impact on the genre.

While every GTA game has its flaws, each also has at least one defining feature or mechanic that became its legacy. Whether it’s a breakthrough in storytelling or the birth of sandbox freedom, these standout aspects are what helped turn the series from a controversial curio into one of the most important franchises in gaming history.

Grand Theft Auto

Open-World Chaos Ahead Of Its Time

6 Images
6 Images
Grand Theft Auto
6.5 /10
Released
November 28, 1997

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
m
Developer(s)
Rockstar North
Powered by

Before open worlds became industry standard, the original Grand Theft Auto delivered something few games dared to, giving players freedom without rules or limits. Its top-down perspective didn’t inhibit the chaos but actually amplified it, and players could freely wreak havoc across several cities without ever completing a mission.

What made this chaos feel special was how reactive the world was. Cops swarmed, gangs retaliated, and the game never punished the player for experimenting. It may be primitive by today’s standards, but its foundation of unrestricted player agency was radical for the time and set the tone for the entire series.

Grand Theft Auto 2

Tactical Layers Thanks To Gang Respect

Grand Theft Auto 2
7.8 /10
Released
February 13, 1999

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
m
Developer(s)
Rockstar North, Rockstar Games
Powered by

Grand Theft Auto 2 expanded the series’ sandbox mayhem with a more tactical layer, introducing a gang respect system that meant working one gang would end up alienating another, turning every mission into a reputation gamble. Players couldn’t simply breeze through objectives; they had to consider allegiances and rivalries in each area of the city.

This system was ahead of its time, hinting at moral complexity in a series still known mainly for chaos. It added replay value and gave the world more personality, encouraging players to think beyond destruction, and while it’s not as well-remembered as later titles, GTA 2 laid important groundwork for the depth to come.

Grand Theft Auto 3

A True 3D Open World

Grand Theft Auto 3
13
7.8 /10
Released
October 23, 2001

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood, Strong Language, Violence
Developer(s)
Rockstar Games
Powered by

Grand Theft Auto 3 wasn’t just a leap forward but a complete reinvention. The jump to 3D changed everything, making Liberty City feel real, alive, and interconnected in a way that games had never captured before. Players could walk, drive, shoot, or simply explore a world that now existed in more than just two dimensions.

The immersion was groundbreaking, and for many, this was the first time a game gave them a city to live in and not just play through. From radio stations to unpredictable pedestrian behavior, the intricate details made Liberty City unforgettable. This was the moment where GTA stopped being a curiosity and became a cultural juggernaut.

Grand Theft Auto: Vice City

Stylish, Musical, And Neon-Drenched, Just Like Real-Life Miami

Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
26
9.2 /10
Released
October 29, 2002

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Violence
Developer(s)
Rockstar Games
Powered by

Set in a fictionalized 1980s Miami, Grand Theft Auto: Vice City delivered one of the most distinct moods in gaming history. The pastel suits, synth-heavy soundtrack, and crime-lord story combined with a deeply stylized world that didn’t just recreate an era, but celebrated it. With every mission and radio station drenched in 80s excess, Vice City felt like a genuine recreation of a real place, rather than just a virtual imitation.

Tommy Vercetti’s rise to power was great, but the real star was the city itself. From oceanfront mansions to pulsing nightclubs, Vice City had such a distinctive style, and it proved that GTA could do more than entertain and invite destruction, serving as a symbol of beauty over chaos.

Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas

Unmatched Scale That Expanded The Franchise Into RPG Territory

5 Images
5 Images
Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
112
8.6 /10
Released
October 26, 2004

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Drugs
Developer(s)
Rockstar Games
Powered by

Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas took everything that Vice City did and expanded it massively. Three cities, along with the surrounding countryside, mountains, and deserts, made the game more than just a map, but a whole state. On top of that came RPG mechanics that allowed players to level up CJ's skills outside of combat and make their playthrough feel more like real life than fiction.

It was overwhelming in the best way. CJ felt like so much more than just a protagonist, with players being able to mold him however they chose. The systems weren’t always polished, but they gave players more control and immersion than any open-world game before it, taking a bold step forward that was met with immense praise.

Grand Theft Auto Advance

Maximized Older Hardware With A Story-Focused Format

6 Images
6 Images
Grand Theft Auto Advance
Action
Adventure
Systems
Released
October 26, 2004

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
m
Developer(s)
Digital Eclipse
Powered by

While it retained the top-down perspective of the early games, Grand Theft Auto Advance surprised players with how seriously it took its story. The player's journey through Liberty City is unexpectedly personal, and the game is packed with betrayal, loyalty, and revenge, all told within the boundaries of the GBA’s limited hardware.

What it lacked in visuals, it made up for in narrative ambition. It showed Rockstar could still deliver a compelling tale even without flashy graphics or massive maps. For handheld fans, it was a rare example of story-first design, and its role as a prequel to GTA 3 gave it added weight in the larger GTA timeline.

Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories

Reimagining A Classic Map With Brand New Mechanics

Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories
7.3 /10
Released
October 25, 2005

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
m
Developer(s)
Rockstar Leeds, Rockstar North
Powered by

Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories brought players back to the city that redefined gaming, but this time, with smoother controls, better shooting, and new missions tailored for portable play. It felt like a full console experience in the palm of the player's hands. Revisiting the familiar map with new stories added depth to the lore that many series fans welcomed with open arms.

The game also refined some core mechanics, introducing motorcycles to the city and adding side content like real estate and side missions. For fans who loved GTA 3 , Liberty City Stories offered a perfect blend of nostalgia and polish, making it one of the most beloved entries on the PSP.

Grand Theft Auto: Vice City Stories

Building A True Vice City Empire

Grand Theft Auto: Vice City Stories
7.0 /10
Released
October 31, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
e
Developer(s)
Rockstar Games
Powered by

Grand Theft Auto: Vice City Stories gave players the chance to explore a younger, grittier Vice City as Victor Vance, and it brought with it some serious upgrades over its Liberty City predecessor. The map felt more alive, the mission design more varied, and the world richer than any other portable GTA to date.

Beyond visuals, the game introduced empire-building, letting players take over businesses and fight for economic control of the city. It gave the narrative more purpose and gameplay more variety, and for a handheld title, it felt huge, and many fans still consider it one of the PSP’s greatest technical achievements.

Grand Theft Auto 4

A Darker, More Grounded Tale

Grand Theft Auto 4
25
9.1 /10
Released
April 29, 2008

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood, Intense Violence, Partial Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Drugs and Alcohol
Developer(s)
Rockstar Games
Powered by

Grand Theft Auto 4 marked a shift in tone from the previous entries, with the color palette dulled, the humor sharpened, and the story taking center stage. Niko Bellic’s tragic search for the American Dream delivered the most emotionally complex narrative the series had seen, as the game explored loyalty and loss in a way that surprised longtime fans.

This focus on storytelling elevated the franchise, and while some missed the wildness of San Andreas , many appreciated the weight and nuance in its place. Liberty City once again felt like a real place with real consequences, and for once, the satire came wrapped in genuine pathos, showing that the franchise could be mature without losing its edge.

Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars

Added Depth To The Moment-To-Moment Gameplay

Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars
8.0 /10
Released
March 17, 2009

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood and Gore, Drug Reference, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Violence
Developer(s)
Rockstar Leeds, Rockstar North
Powered by

Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars wasn’t afraid to shake things up. With its cel-shaded art, top-down camera, and touchscreen minigames, it was a bold reinvention of the formula running on brand-new portable hardware that could barely keep up. Yet it still felt unmistakably like GTA , with drug dealing, gang wars, and a darkly comedic storyline tying it all together.

The game’s real standout feature was how interactive and layered it felt. Players had to hotwire cars manually, manage contraband economies, and work their way through a surprisingly deep RPG-like system. It brought mechanical depth and stylized presentation that made it not only one of the best handheld GTA s, but also one of the most innovative in the series overall.
